extendedInfo.description: HP Interviewing is the mobile app of the business book High Performance Interviewing. The app is an abridged version of the book.If you are seeking the complete text to the book please see the tablet app under the same name or purchase the book.  You can find the products at www.compactconcepts.com.High Performance Interviewing is a concise guide to winning in the interviews that can change your life.  It comprises seven key concepts that will enable you to navigate and successfully capitalize on any interview situation and accelerate your career.  It is designed as a self-development guide for senior executives and senior executive aspirants but it the ideas can be applied for by students just as well as Chief Executives.The mobile app HPI provides a bullet-point summary of the book together with an interactive self-assessment tool and a notes section, so that you can store preparatory notes before and reflections after your interviews.  The mobile app is an ideal complement to the book or tablet app High Performance Interviewing, as it enables you to carry the concepts in your pocket as a reminder available at any time.
